description: Receives chess positions (FEN) or games (PGN) and provides deep analysis: evaluates each move, explains strategic and positional concepts, identifies errors, suggests best alternatives with detailed reasoning explanation

example_response.analysis_type: Type of analysis: fen_analysis or pgn_analysis

best_moves.explanation: Detailed explanation of why this move is good

move_classifications.classification: excellent, good, inaccuracy, mistake, or blunder
move_classifications.best_alternative: The best move if this was not optimal

example_response.summary: Overall summary of the analysis with key lessons
